Name: Guo Zi
Text: MovieTalk Table - Guo Zi

Name: Rain
Text: By the Decree of Union, thou shalt take thy true form... Reveal!

Name: Selena
Text: They're all envoys shaped by the power of wishes and prayers. We need to destroy them completely.

Name: Yun Ye
Text: Rain, what is this obsession that binds you? Why must you persist so?

Name: Rain
Text: Of all people, I didn't think you would be the one asking this...

Name: Yun Ye
Text: Rain, if you truly seek enlightenment, I shall rightfully pass my divine station to you when the time comes. But for now, please... stop this.

Name: Rain
Text: If I stop now, it will all be for nothing...

Name: Selena
Text: It's over now.

Name: Rain
Text: I expected no less from you, esteemed one...

Name: Discord
Text: Someone is still guiding me, someone hasn't given up on me...!

Name: Lilith
Text: So, will you stand by my side for Eleanor's sake?

Name: Lilith
Text: Wouldn't it be nice to just be my assistant forever? You never have to think again. Wouldn't that be nice?

Name: Lilith
Text: Oh? Raising your scissors against me?

Name: Lilith
Text: Ha... So... you rejected me this time, huh...?

Name: Lilith
Text: Alright, this is where your path ends. Turn back.

Name: Lilith
Text: This is your final order—don't come see me ever again.

Name: Discord
Text: Found you... I will find it... a life that belongs to none other than Discord.

Name: Discord
Text: Someone is still guiding me, someone hasn't given up on me...!

Name: Lilith
Text: So, will you stand by my side for Eleanor's sake?

Name: Lilith
Text: Wouldn't it be nice to just be my assistant forever? You never have to think again. Wouldn't that be nice?

Name: Lilith
Text: Oh? Raising your scissors against me?

Name: Lilith
Text: Ha... So... you rejected me this time, huh...?

Name: Lilith
Text: Alright, this is where your path ends. Turn back.

Name: Lilith
Text: This is your final order—don't come see me ever again.

Name: Discord
Text: Found you... I will find it... a life that belongs to none other than Discord.
<color=#e8f5ff>The Final Three Acts</color>

Name: Needle
Text: Tomorrow will be better...

Name: Scissors
Text: You can't go back.

Name: Fabric
Text: I had no choice!

Name: Thread
Text: Why... why do you get to have so much?!

Name: Discord
Text: The ties of the past, I'll cut them myself!

Name: Polard Instructor
Text: Without orders, you're not allowed to resist! Do not resist!

Name: Discord
Text: I don't have to follow your orders anymore!
Here's a chance to make up for your regrets.
They think you're a police officer. Perfect—you always wanted to know the truth, didn't you?

Name: Old Tailor
Text: You're my greatest treasure.

Name: Rosewater
Text: Don't worry. Your new life is about to start any moment now.
Here, little puppy! Where are you? (Nursery Rhyme-like tone) (Giggle) The thing you cherished so much... It was nothing but trash to others.

Name: Discord
Text: This world is still (like this)... nothing's changed at all.
Cold Current inbound. Target sterilized. "Embroidery Scissors" disposable—send cleanup. Handle Attachment separately.

Name: Discord
Text: Send cleanup... Copy that. Burn... everything.
Opening Lines Placeholder 1 - Keep brief

Name: Discord
Text: (What should I choose?)

Name: Discord
Text: (Let's ask the residents around here first.)

Name: Resident A
Text: Scissors had a fight with the old tailor before. I think Scissors made some threats back then.

Name: Resident B
Text: Fabric slept at my house that night. And I think they've stocked up on quite a bit of fabric recently.

Name: Discord
Text: (Should I look for clues from those four?)

Name: Scissors
Text: The old tailor, he...

Name: Needle
Text: ...Then you...

Name: Discord
Text: (Let me find a place to eavesdrop on their conversation.)

Name: Scissors
Text: Let's continue where we left off.

Name: Discord
Text: (They left, but it looks like they dropped something on the ground.)

Name: Discord
Text: (What's this? A torn lottery ticket...)
Subsequent performance content to be added

Name: Placeholder
Text: Performance section to be refined
<color=#8B50F2>I'm giving you a chance to make up for your regrets.</color>

Name: Discord
Text: Why... he too...

Name: Discord
Text: ...Let's dig it up and see for ourselves.
Discord obtained information about the truth through some means (needs narrative packaging) - Keep brief

Name: Gossipy Resident
Text: They say when the big man at the workshop's daughter got sick, he ran all over town buying her medicine and spent every moment he could at her bedside.

Name: Gossipy Resident
Text: Most of the time he looked like a fool, but whenever he spoke of his daughter he became serious. He always said he promised to give her the very best.

Name: Gossipy Resident
Text: Wait, did he even have a daughter?

Name: Needle
Text: I don't know anything. After the gathering ended, I just went back to sewing the orders for my clients.

Name: Scissors
Text: Yes, I can vouch for that.

Name: Discord
Text: (Lying.)

Name: Scissors
Text: Thread went to pick up the top-up for both of us. There are witnesses who can prove it. Fabric was on the phone with clients the entire time. The workshop's surveillance footage stayed <color=#FF0000>intact</color> right up until the fire broke out.

Name: Needle
Text: Yes. After the master went back to his room, he <color=#FF0000>locked</color> the door. He must have been drunk and didn't notice the fire. We couldn't save him. It was... an unfortunate accident.

Name: Discord
Text: (The door was locked... Doesn't make sense.)

Name: Needle
Text: What do we do... they're going to find out... they're going to find out!

Name: Scissors
Text: You don't have to worry, alright? I'll protect you. You haven't done anything wrong. And besides, the police have no evidence.

Name: Sleepless Resident
Text: The night after the tailor workshop burned down, I saw a dark figure rushing out in a hurry...

Name: Sleepless Resident
Text: The way he moved... it looked like he was burying something.

Name: Frightened Resident
Text: It's terrifying. They say the fire was caused by old wiring.

Name: Frightened Resident
Text: If you ask me, he just didn't want to give up the workshop, so he set the fire himself!

Name: Frightened Resident
Text: It's all retribution...

Name: Gossipy Resident
Text: At first, it was that thin girl apprentice who bought supplies for the workshop. Later it became those two apprentices, a man and a woman, doing it together.

Name: Chatting Resident
Text: Grew up with nothing. No family, no support. Struggling to survive.

Name: Cautious Resident
Text: Shh, keep your distance. Don't you know she mixes with all kinds of shady people?

Name: Discord
Text: I don't want to know... the so-called truth!

Name: Discord
Text: (No... the fire was set after he was already dead.)

Name: Discord
Text: All of this... just for a false hope!

Name: Discord
Text: Was I blinded all this time, misled by Needle?

Name: Discord
Text: Someone moved these fabrics ahead of time.

Name: Discord
Text: These are the scissors the old tailor loved most. But why is there no trace of blood? Could this not be the real murder weapon?

Name: Discord
Text: If so, then why would Fabric hide the scissors?

Name: Discord
Text: That notch in the blades... it doesn't sit right with me.

Name: Discord
Text: It's all tangled, just like this mess of threads... what am I still missing?

Name: Discord
Text: Damn it. Why did I ignore all this back then?

Name: Discord
Text: The old tailor would never have placed electrical machines in the living quarters...

Name: Discord
Text: This... this is the real murder weapon. And the real killer.

Name: Cautious Resident
Text: What's kept inside...

Name: Chatting Resident
Text: Poor girl...

Name: Liv
Text: The signal's picking up more than one "little ghost"... Actually, a lot more.

Name: Liv
Text: There's something about them that feels... familiar. Should we take a closer look?

Name: Mechanoid
Text: Stay away... from the treasure...

Name: Liv
Text: Treasure?

Name: Mechanoid
Text: Close to... treasure... G94... attack...

Name: Liv
Text: They seem to be guarding something. We need to figure out why they're here...

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant, be cautious. The mechanoids here are behaving much more aggressively.

Name: Liv
Text: This mechanoid has shifted into a defensive mode. If we force our way through, we could ruin any chance of communicating with it...

Name: Liv
Text: We need to find its weakness...

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant, may I rely on your strength?

Name: Sniper-G94
Text: Biometric scan... Negative.Attempting to restart defense systems... Restart failed.

Name: Liv
Text: What are you protecting?

Name: Sniper-G94
Text: Little master's... treasure.

Name: Mechanoid
Text: Stay away... from the treasure...

Name: Liv
Text: Treasure?

Name: Mechanoid
Text: Close to... treasure... G94... attack...

Name: Liv
Text: They seem to be guarding something. We need to figure out why they're here...

Name: Sniper-G94
Text: Biometric scan... Negative.\nAttempting to restart defense systems... Restart failed.

Name: Liv
Text: What are you protecting?

Name: Sniper-G94
Text: Little master's... treasure.

Name: Liv
Text: The mine's core lab... this must be it.

Name: Liv
Text: A camp left behind by the execution squad... looks like they reached this place too.

Name: Liv
Text: These people... were they the ones treated by Melinoe?

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant, the Punishing level seems to be rising—

Name: Liv
Text: What is this?!

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant! Over there!

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant! Hold on to me! We're going down!

Name: Liv
Text: Is that... a tombstone? The name looks familiar...

Name: Liv
Text: The minerals are filled with chaotic Punishing Virus, different from the ones outside.

Name: Liv
Text: It's... minerals?! These monsters...

Name: Liv
Text: It's a trap! Watch out, Commandant!
